## SparseMatrix.trace() method

Returns the trace of the matrix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
trace(): S;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`S`

The trace

## Remarks

The trace of a matrix is the sum of the entries along the main diagonal
